title: How Ascari's final F1 race ended with  dramatic drop into Monaco harbour
summary: This is the story of how two-time F1 champion Alberto Ascari ended up in the Monaco harbour, in what would be his last-ever Grand Prix

qa_pairs.question: Who was the two-time F1 champion involved in a dramatic incident at the Monaco Grand Prix?
What significant event marked Alberto Ascari's final F1 race?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: He fell into the Monaco harbour.
wrong_options: He retired due to mechanical failure.

qa_pairs.question: In which year did Alberto Ascari's last F1 race take place?
